intension: Create an Instagram ad promoting the use of renewable energy, specifically wind turbines, for a cleaner and more sustainable environment.
globalcaption: The image features a large wind farm with several wind turbines standing tall in the background. The wind turbines are positioned at various heights and angles, creating a visually striking scene. The sun is setting behind the wind farm, casting a warm glow on the scene. The wind turbines are located near a body of water, which adds to the overall beauty of the image.
keywords: alternative, care, clean, conservation, eco, ecologic, ecosystem, electricity, energy, environment, environmental, farm, generation, generator, green, industrial, innovation, power, renewable, technology, turbines, wind, wind energy, ad, instagram, ig, insta, advertisement

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue and white background with a blue splash of paint on the white surface. The blue paint appears to be dripping downwards, creating a visually interesting effect. The white surface beneath the blue paint is textured, adding depth and dimension to the scene

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a serene scene of wind turbines standing tall in the distance, with the sun setting behind them. The wind turbines are positioned in a row, casting a long shadow on the ground. The sky above them is blue, and the sun is setting, creating a beautiful backdrop for the scene. The wind turbines are the main focus of the image, and they are the only objects visible in the frame
